citeinfo.origin: Wildlife Conservation Division, Alaska Department of Fish and Game
citeinfo.title: Harbor and Spotted Seals Telemetry Data

descript.abstract: Data Type: Mammals; Purpose to support the monitoring of and analysis of data from satellite telemetered spotted seals and harbor seals. Data is received from Service ARGOS. Foxpro is used to house and screen raw data. GIS is used to perform analysis of data. One such application is to investigate the relationship between ice and spotted seals and the relationship between harbor seals and finer scale habitat characteristics, including bathymetry.

idinfo.accconst: Subject to provisions of Alaska Administrative Code on dis-closure of public records and subject to Department of Fish and Game Standard Operating Procedure on public information.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
